column5: This was on my FB wall so just wanted to share for a laugh!

A clear case of when good moose go bad ...probably from watching too much tv, video games mixed in with a little bit of peer pressure and Jerry Springer!  Their next move is to likely sue us for causing their wayward ways .   They have gone bad indeed!
LOL awesome..Hey at least they have good taste in beer!..
A guy posted that earlier this week.  Funny stuf!
Our antlered friends are always good for a laugh eh Miracon?  <iframe width="480" height="360" src="http://www.youtube.com/embed/CyyY05bSDMA" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen></iframe>

Just one question......How the heck do you arrest a moose for impaired driving???  ''Sir, putting one foot in front of the other 3, i want you to take 10 steps, pivot on you left rear hoof, and walk back''
LMAO mike and tb!  @ Nick! Darn! Missed it or wouldn't have double posted!  Wish I was the first though! Haha!  @ Roy...I LOVE that video! Could watch it more then once!
